attributes.title: We Hunt the NEW ROLE: LOOT GOBLIN - Gmod: TTT
attributes.description:
In this Gmod gameplay, we add a new the Loot Goblin role!
Click here for Gmod TTT information ► https://roosterteeth.com/g/post/ad5b95dc-ffba-4f2a-93d2-fc42ff392796
Bonus rounds start at: 34:04

attributes.title: Gmod Train Keeps Murdering Us - Gmod: TTT
attributes.description:
In this Gmod gameplay, some of us try to 1v1 a train!
Bonus rounds start at: 32:14

attributes.title: Who Put Crabs On The Elevator?! - Gmod: TTT
attributes.description:
It’s Gmod time! This week, we find out what’s more deadly… A Traitor, or an elevator. 
Bonus Rounds starts at: 34:20

attributes.title: Moon Balls Do TONS of Damage!
attributes.description:
We're back in Gmod: TTT! We added soap and take Moon Balls to the face!
Bonus rounds start at: 37:38

attributes.title: This Gun Is Too Dang Long - Gmod: TTT
attributes.description:
It’s Gmod time! This week, the gang tries to survive against the new long revolver, but will they come up short?
Bonus Rounds starts at: 42:24

attributes.title: Catching Pokemon w/ GUNS! - Gmod: GarrýMon
attributes.description: This week Pokemon Legends comes to Gmod! Six Trainers compete to catch the most GarrýMon before times up!

attributes.title: Is Milk The Best Prop to Hide As? - Gmod: Prop Hunt
attributes.description: It's Prop Hunt in Gmod! Our lactose intolerant Hunters hunt their most feared advisary: Milk.

attributes.title: We Added A NEW ROLE: The Boxer - Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: We're back with a new role in Gmod: TTT! It's time for The Boxer to try and KO everyone!

attributes.title: Dont Murder Me STEP BRO - Gmod: Murder
attributes.description: It’s Gmod time! This week, BlizzB3ar joins us for some Murder, as well as helping some step bros who got stuck under the sink.

attributes.title: We Play A New GMOD Gamemode: SacriFUN!
attributes.description: We're back with more Gmod! This week, we try out a new gamemode called SacriFUN! Try to sabotage the other players to be the last person standing!

attributes.title: This NEW ROLE Makes Us SWOLE! - Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: We’re back with more TTT and new role! The Gym Rat is pumped up and ready to beat down any Traitors who get in their way.

attributes.title: NEW Gamemode: The Floor is Lava!
attributes.description: We're back in another Gmod gamemode: The Floor is Lava! The gang gets together and runs from the... floor? Because hot.

attributes.title: TTT But We're Wizards Now! - Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: It’s Gmod time! This week, we added a little bit of magic to TTT with a flying brooms mod.

attributes.title: NEW WEAPON in Gmod TTT is a Pillow?
attributes.description: We're playing some more Gmod TTT, But this time, we have our new AH pillow and umbrella as custom items!

attributes.title: NEW Gmod Gamemode: You Touched it Last
attributes.description: We play some classic schoolyard games reimagined in Gmod!

attributes.title: Let's Play Prop Hunt in Star Wars! | Gmod
attributes.description: In honor of it almost being Star Wars Day, we’ve got a Star Wars themed Prop Hunt in Gmodl! Michael, Trevor, Alfredo, Jeremy, Ky, and Matt will be battling it out in trying to be the best person at hiding, as well as hunting. Let’s hope the force is strong in all of them.

attributes.title: New Gmod Weapon That Turns Us to Stone - Gmod TTT
attributes.description: We turn things back to the stone age in this episode of TTT.  Join Ky, Matt, Jack, Alfredo, Joe, and Trevor as they get their hands on the new Petrification Beam and turn each other into stone.

attributes.title: Let's Play Gmod TTT:  Playing Pirates with Cannons
attributes.description: There's a mutiny on the SS Gmod, and it's everyone for themselves! Michael, Trevor, Matt, Jack, BK, Joe, and Alfredo are on the high seas fighting with heavy artillery in this TTT.

attributes.title: NEW Star Wars Guns in Gmod: TTT!
attributes.description: It’s Gmod time! This week, we’re playing TTT in a galaxy far, far away. Ify, Jeremy, Matt, BK, Alfredo, Ky, and Joe figure out who's working for the Empire with some new Star Wars guns.

attributes.title: Let's Play: Gmod Murder in a Haunted House!
attributes.description: It's time to go back to Gmod Murder on a brand new Haunted House map!  While dealing with a faulty light switch BK, Ky, Matt, Trevor, Michael, and Alfredo will have to deduce who is the murderer as heavy rain sets in and the lights can't seem to stay on.

attributes.title: Let's Play Gmod TTT: WHO DONE IT?
attributes.description: It's time for more TTT in Gmod! Betrayals, backstabbings, and chaos are heading your way this week with Michael, Trevor, Ky, BK, Matt, Joe, and Alfredo as they figure out who is a baddie and who is a goodie and who is an inbetweener.

attributes.title: Let's Play Gmod TTT: BOOM Goes the Traitor
attributes.description: It's Gmod TTT! Lindsay, Michael, Jack, Alfredo, Ky, Joe, and Matt are terrorizing and being traitorous all while discussing some of their...unique Avatar element bending abilities that they'd like to have. We'll just leave it at that.

attributes.title: Mario Kart in Gmod is Insanity
attributes.description: Michael, BK, Trevor, Matt, Joe, Alfredo, and Jarren show what it means to be family as they race around on Mario Kart maps in Gmod!

attributes.title: James & James… and James? | Let's Play Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: It’s Gmod time! This week, Trevor, Michael, Ky, Joe, Alfredo, Gavin, and Jack see if James & James can defeat their newest threat.. Another James.

attributes.title: Our New Hot Potato Weapon EXPLODES | Let's Play Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: It’s Gmod time! This week, we’ve added our scariest weapon yet.. A singing potato that explodes. Let’s see if the gang can survive this one!

attributes.title: Stranger Things in Gmod (Steve Dies??) | Let's Play Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: Bonus Rounds Start at: 23:44 | What do you get when you combine a buff Demogorgon, a spear throwing James, and the upside down?  Well its this episode of Gmod: TTT of course!  Join Matt, BK, Michael, Trevor, Gavin, and Jack as they are teleported to the upside down and are batted into the sky. | NEW ROLE: Revenger is a special innocent that spawns with a soulmate. If the soulmate is killed, the Revenger will get a radar ping to their killer. Click here for Gmod TTT Information ► https://bit.ly/3z8WzLS

attributes.title: Mario's Goomba Stomp is OVERPOWERED | Let's Play Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: Bonus Rounds Start at 26:45 | Wahoo! We've got the power to stomp on each other's heads just like Mario. Find out who's worthy of the red cap in this Gmod: TTT! Click here for Gmod TTT Information ► https://bit.ly/3z8WzLS

attributes.title: Show Me Your Goldfinger | Let's Play Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: Bonus Rounds Start at: 27:43 | The names Hunter, Achievement Hunter.  Special agents Matt, Joe, Alfredo, BK, Gavin, Jack, and Michael are sent on secret mission to kill each other with TV's, harpoons, and golden guns in this weeks Goldeneye themed Gmod. | Click here for Gmod TTT Information ► https://bit.ly/3z8WzLS

attributes.title: Let's Play Assassin's Creed in Gmod
attributes.description: Bonus Rounds Start at: 24:54 | In this week's Gmod we ask the question: Which Achievement Hunter is the best Assassin?  In a throwback to the classic Assassins Creed: Brotherhood multiplayer game mode, Michael, Jack, Lindsay, Alfredo, Joe, Matt, and BK will have to hunt each other and score the most points before the time runs out!  Each player will have a single target and have to eliminate them before their pursuers catch them first.

attributes.title: We Added a Man Eating Shark to Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: Bonus rounds start at: 28:38 | Shark attack fact: In the United States, there is on average only one shark related fatality per year!  In this Gmod that is completely the opposite!  Join Matt, BK, Jack, Michael, Gavin, Trevor, and Alfredo as they give shark week a run for it's money in this great white of an episode.  Click here for Gmod TTT Information ► https://bit.ly/3z8WzLS

attributes.title: This NEW Squeaky Chicken Heals! | Let's Play Gmod: TTT
attributes.description:
Bonus Rounds start at: 27:10
It’s Gmod time! This week, we’ve added a healing, squeaking, rubber chicken to help get rid of these pesky traitors! I’ve also decided the shark and the rubber chicken are best friends.

attributes.title: I Do Declare a Murder! - Gmod: Murder
attributes.description: We're back with more Gmod Murder! Betrayal, sneaking, manipulation, and weirdly enough, some murders can be found here as Michael, Lindsay, Alfredo, Joe, BK, and Matt try to kill the murderer before the murderer murders them on a murder spree. Wow, murder doesn't even sound like a real word anymore.

attributes.title: Trouble in The Red Dragon Inn! | Gmod: TTT
attributes.description:
To celebrate the end of Hardcore Tabletop Presents: The Red Dragon Inn, we take the Gmod crew to our very own personal tavern with some new specialty drinks! Come enjoy a drink with Trevor, Matt, Michael, Lindsay, Joe, Jack, and Barbara as we sift out the traitors of the tavern! The Special Red Dragon Inn drinks are as follows: Dragon Breath Ale - Sets Fire to those around you, Gnomish Inspiration Ale - Awards 2 Credits, Halfing Stout - Shrinks you to half your size, Pixie Punch - Gives you a big head and makes you floaty, Holy Water - Provides some health, Fairy Ale - Increases Jump Height, and Wizard's Brew - Increases Speed.
Bonus rounds start at: 24:34

attributes.title: Football Is Now in Gmod | Let's Play Extreme Football Throwdown
attributes.description: Football season is back even in in Gmod!  Extreme Football Throwdown pits Michael, Joe, BK, Jack, Alfredo, Jeremy, and Jarren against each other in this bloody battle of shoulder charges, melon launchers, and magic wands.  Bonus Rounds Start at: 35:42

attributes.title: Dark Lord Superman
attributes.description: It's that Gmod TTT time again! This week we go all out with the Golden Deagle, stone gun, and Goomba Stomp. Plus, we use the jetpack to impersonate our favorite Kryptonian!

attributes.title: Ghostface tries to KILL US in Gmod: Scream
attributes.description: After breaking into a school, Trevor, Alfredo, and Joe will have to run and hide from Ghostface before he can catch them and murder them in this "Scream" inspired story based Gmod.  Will the three of them be able to make it out alive?  Or will they just be another tally on the kill count?

attributes.title: Trying the SCARIEST Haunted Houses in Gmod!
attributes.description: It’s Gmod time! This week, Joe, Jack, Lindsay, and Matt dive into the Horrorween map to see if they can survive monsters waiting for them inside the haunted house.

attributes.title: The Pumpkin Grenade Is So Broken It's SCARY | Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: What's the scariest weapon in Gmod TTT? Well, we think we may have found it with the Green Goblin's pumpkin grenade! This week in Gmod, we put on our Halloween costumes and get blown to smithereens in a (formerly) quiet suburb. Bonus Rounds Start at ► 27:28

attributes.title: This Boat Isn't Big Enough For The Zombies! | Gmod: TTT
attributes.description: Before summer was officially over, we took a quick cruise trip out to sea!  This week join Michael, BK, Jack, Jeremy, Lindsay, and Matt for some Gmod TTT on the high seas!

attributes.title: New Thanos Gun 'Snaps' Half the Players | Gmod TTT
attributes.description: When Kevin Feige ran out of ideas for the next phase in the MCU he quickly turned to us at Achievement Hunter for ideas.  "Have you ever seen Gmod: TTT?" We asked.  Without saying a word, Kevin looked at us, pulled out a blank check and said, "How much do you want?"  Join Jack, Trevor, Lindsay, Alfredo, BK, and Joe as they enter the MCU with this Marvel themed TTT!

attributes.title: We Added Santa Claus Into Garrys Mod! | Gmod TTT
attributes.description: It's the holiday season and Christmas came early to Gmod.  Join Jack, BK, Joe, Alfredo, Matt, Lindsay, and Jeremy as they get into the gift giving season with the new Santa Claus role!
